file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-50-04-04 - CONFIG-1 - RAMP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RAMP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH RAMP ASSEMBLY 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the ramp assembly. B. The ramp assembly is installed in the baggage compartment, at zone 271. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH RAMP 25-50-04-000-802-A RAMP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL ASSEMBLY AIRCRAFT WITH RAMP 25-50-04-400-802-A RAMP ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION ASSEMBLY EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 25-50-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-50-04-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH RAMP ASSEMBLY 2. RAMP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the ramp assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-30-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 A - Does the task Baggage compartment 1 B - Helps the technician A Baggage compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Open the baggage compartment door AMM SDS 52-30-00/1. (3) Make sure that the baggage compartment partition door is closed. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Remove the screws (2) that attach the ramp (1) at the floor. Refer to DET B, Figure 401. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-50-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH RAMP ASSEMBLY Ramp Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT PARTITION (REF.) A ZOOM 271 DOOR (REF.) B 1. RAMP DET. A DET. B 2. SCREW 145AMM250435.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-50-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-50-04-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH RAMP ASSEMBLY 3. RAMP ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the ramp assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-30-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 A - Do the task Baggage compartment 1 B - Helps the technician A Baggage compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Put the ramp assembly (1) in its original position. Refer to DET A, Figure 401. (2) Install the ramp (1) to the floor with the screws (2). Refer to DET B, Figure 401. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Close the baggage compartment door AMM SDS 52-30-00/1.
